content.body: `instanceof` for Mutex/Condition/SharedArray is great. I see that it works for instances of instances of `SharedStructType` as well, though there's still no fast way to see if a value is *any* shared struct (i.e., without access to its specific constructor)
content.formatted_body: instanceof for Mutex/Condition/SharedArray is great. I see that it works for instances of instances of SharedStructType as well, though there's still no fast way to see if a value is any shared struct (i.e., without access to its specific constructor)

content.body: rbuckton: there is, i also added `SharedStructType.isSharedStruct` iirc
content.formatted_body: rbuckton: there is, i also added SharedStructType.isSharedStruct iirc
